body_html: As far as I understand, there's no CPU version so far. When you click on None on pytorch web site, you can see that it lists the same installation command as the CUDA8 link. This can be a mistake in the web page. Let's ask @soumith for clarifications.
body_text: As far as I understand, there's no CPU version so far. When you click on None on pytorch web site, you can see that it lists the same installation command as the CUDA8 link. This can be a mistake in the web page. Let's ask @soumith for clarifications.
body: As far as I understand, there's no CPU version so far. When you click on `None` on pytorch web site, you can see that it lists the same installation command as the CUDA8 link. This can be a mistake in the web page. Let's ask @soumith for clarifications.
